welcomeContent.heading: Welcome to Candelaria Institute
welcomeContent.message: Welcome to CITCI — a place where faith, excellence, and service come together to shape the leaders of tomorrow. Rooted in Catholic values and inspired by Mary, our model, we are committed to providing a nurturing and academically challenging environment that develops learners who are Christ-centered, socially responsible, and globally competitive.

hightlights.title: Faith Formation
hightlights.description: Our Catholic identity permeates all aspects of school life, nurturing students' relationship with Christ through daily prayer, regular Mass, and religious education.

hightlights.title: Academic Excellence
hightlights.description: We provide a rigorous curriculum that challenges students to reach their full potential, fostering critical thinking, creativity, and a lifelong love of learning.

hightlights.title: Vibrant Community
hightlights.description: Our school community is a family where students, parents, faculty, and staff work together to create a supportive and enriching environment for all.

schoolShowcaseContent.heading: Discover Candelaria Institute
schoolShowcaseContent.intro: Where a legacy of faith meets a future of excellence. Rooted in tradition and driven by innovation, Candelaria Institute offers quality Catholic education that shapes minds, nurtures values, and empowers lives.

curriculumOverviewContent.heading: Programs Offered
curriculumOverviewContent.intro: Candelaria Institute offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to develop both academic skills and technical expertise across its educational levels—Basic Education, College Department, and Technical-Vocational Education and Training (TVET).

items.title: Basic Education Program
items.description: Our Basic Education program spans from Elementary to Secondary education, providing students with a strong academic foundation and emphasizing Catholic values.

bullets.title: Elementary Education:
bullets.detail: Emphasizing religious instruction, language arts, mathematics, science, and social studies since 1935.

items.title: Junior High School Program (Grade 7-10)
items.description: Empowering learners through a well-rounded curriculum that prepares them for higher education and responsible citizenship.

items.title: Senior High School Program (Grade 11-12)
items.description: The Senior High School Program at Candelaria Institute equips students with academic excellence, life skills, and spiritual formation, preparing them for higher education, employment, or entrepreneurship.

bullets.title: TECH-VOC Tracks:
bullets.detail: Bread and Pastry Production, Food and Beverages Services, Computer Systems Servicing, Shielded Metal Arc Welding

items.title: College Department
items.description: The College Department offers Bachelor's degrees in education, with majors in Social Studies and English, preparing students for teaching careers.

bullets.title: Bachelor of Secondary Education (BSEd):
bullets.detail: Majors in Social Studies and English, preparing students for secondary education teaching roles. Recognized by the government since 2014.

items.title: TVET Programs
items.description: Candelaria Institute offers a variety of TESDA-approved TVET courses, equipping students with the practical skills and certifications needed for various industries.

highlightsContent.title: Faith
highlightsContent.description: Rooted in Catholic tradition, we cultivate a deep relationship with God through prayer, sacramental life, and daily witness to Gospel values, guiding students to live with purpose and integrity.

highlightsContent.title: Service
highlightsContent.description: Inspired by Christ’s example, we encourage a life of compassion and generosity by engaging students in meaningful service to others—within the school, the parish, and the wider community.

highlightsContent.title: Excellence
highlightsContent.description: We pursue academic and personal excellence by challenging students to reach their highest potential, fostering critical thinking, creativity, and a lifelong love of learning in a values-driven environment.
